how_step2_desc: Book times that fit your schedule. Easy rescheduling if plans change.

compare_empty: All packages include personalized coaching, flexible scheduling, and progress tracking.
faq1_q: Can I switch between One-on-One and Group lessons?
faq1_a: Yes! You can switch formats between billing periods. Contact us and we'll help you transition smoothly.
faq2_q: What's the difference between One-on-One and Group sessions?
faq2_a: One-on-One sessions are 60 minutes of private coaching focused entirely on your goals. Group sessions are 90 minutes with 2–5 learners, offering collaborative practice at a lower cost per person.
faq3_a: We match learners with similar proficiency levels and learning goals to ensure productive, balanced sessions.
faq4_q: What if I miss a session?
faq4_a: You can reschedule within your package period. We offer flexible rescheduling with 24-hour notice.
faq5_a: Yes! We provide custom programs for teams with volume pricing, dedicated account management, progress reporting, and flexible billing options.
